body:
A [new version](https://cgit.freedesktop.org/xorg/font/util) of `xorg/font/util` was released recently, for the first time in several years.

Tested on CentOS  6, gcc 8.2

(@mamelara @tgamblin -- This may or may not help with #12547 -- but seems worth trying.)
title: font-util: new release 1.3.2
